description:
The appearance of a new unit piloted by Isuzu`s subordinate Callaway puts the Union fleet in desperate straits. Callaway visits Isuzu to report her success in battle, but certain actions by the man she esteems so highly trigger mental instability.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: BUT THERE THERE WAS A GIMLET / AI
